Text: Weekend Review Economy and TerrorismTreasury Secretary Paul ONeill made the rounds Sunday to discuss the state of the economy and the effects of the war on terrorism Senators Patrick Leahy and Richard Shelby talked about national security and civil liberties issues on NBCs Meet the Press For a wrapup of Sundays discussions visit And dont forget on Wednesday we will have Rep Heather Wilson Republican of New Mexico as a guest for a live chat You wont want to miss it Sponsored by ZOGBY International is teaming up with EVOTECOM to build and develop a population of civicminded individuals who can assist in producing the most reliable accurate and scientific online polling Tired of seeing polls that dont represent your own opinions This is your opportunity to have your opinion counted Zogby International promises complete confidentiality plus a free informational product for those who choose to register Click Here Now pollregistrationregistrationindextrackcfmrevotecom Dont want future EVOTECOM updates Visit newsalert to remove your email address from our list
